title: Software Engineer
description:
We're looking for
 **Software Engineers** 
 !
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain secure, scalable, and user\\-friendly web applications
* Build responsive APEX applications, forms, interactive reports, dashboards, and workflows using APEX components, themes, and templates.
* Design efficient schemas, implement complex SQL/PL/SQL logic, packages, functions, and triggers; ensure data integrity and performance.
* Implement RESTful Web Services (ORDS), consume and expose APIs, and integrate with enterprise systems (ERP/CRM/Identity providers).

* Great Communication skills.
* Analytical and problem\\-solving skills

title: Web Application Developer
description:
*PHP, MySQL, Magento, Zend*
 We are looking for a PHP Developer specializing in the Ecommerce platform Magento. The ideal candidate should have several years of experience in retail (ecommerce) site development using Magento. This is a full time, permanent opportunity, to join a growing team!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**The ideal candidate for the PHP Magento Developer role:**
* Has a good understanding of Magento and LAMP stack at an advanced level
* Uses source control
* Will Build, develop and support a website based on php and/or e\\-commerce platform.
* Has Experience developing web\\-based applications that interface with a database
* Experience with the following Web development languages: PHP,HTML/XHTML, JavaScript, Java, My/SQL,SQL and CSS
* Can comfortably modify a Magento theme and build custom plugins
* Ability to work with Magento features such as multiple stores and authentication
* Integrate creative designs into the an e\\-commerce platform from HTML templates
* Experience of cross\\-browser testing and implementation


**Requirements**
* Advanced experience developing with the Magento e\\-commerce platform
* Experience with MySQL database design and administration
* Experience with PHP / XML / REST
* Knowledge of current HTML / CSS / XHTML standards
* Knowledge of JavaScript / AJAX technologies and methods
* Detail oriented with excellent organization and time\\-management abilities


**Optional Skills**
* Ability to work in a fast paced, flexible project environment.
* Ability to work under pressure and to exacting standards and deadlines
* Strong written and verbal communication skills
* Excellent documentation skills
* Knowledge of WordPress, Piwiki, Joomla or Drupal


**Benefits**
* Excellent base salary
* Performance Bonus
* Medical Insurance
* Flexible working hours
* Trainings ( IT Skills)


 Apply Now

title: Software Engineer
description:
Guest Ban is a hospitality SaaS company helping hotels keep guests, staff, and communities safer while speeding up front desk operations. Our platform combines ID scanning, a shared Do Not Rent network, and automated criminal and sex offender checks into a single workflow. We integrate directly with hotel PMS systems to reduce check\\-in time, chargebacks, and repeat problem guests, while improving operational efficiency and guest experience.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 We‚Äôre expanding our platform and are looking for experienced Full Stack JavaScript Developers with strong Node.js expertise who can work remotely and independently. You will take ownership of building and scaling full web applications end\\-to\\-end in a fast\\-moving, product\\-driven environment. Your work will directly impact real hotel operations used daily across the industry.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications using Node.js, Express or similar frameworks, and modern JavaScript or TypeScript
* Build and maintain RESTful APIs and backend services that integrate with internal systems, third\\-party APIs, and hotel PMS platforms
* Work with MongoDB for document\\-based data models and Microsoft SQL Server for relational and transactional data
* Design database schemas, write optimized queries, and manage data consistency across multiple storage systems
* Develop frontend applications using React, Next.js, Angular, or similar frameworks
* Collaborate with desktop and scanning components by integrating backend services with local or cloud\\-based applications
* Deploy, monitor, and maintain applications using cloud infrastructure (Azure or similar platforms)
* Use Git and GitHub for version control, pull requests, and collaborative code reviews
* Support CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployments
* Debug production issues, improve performance, and build reliable, scalable solutions
* Collaborate closely with product, support, and founders to ship features that deliver immediate value to hotel partners



  





**Required Skills and Experience** 



* Strong experience with Node.js and backend JavaScript or TypeScript
* Hands\\-on experience building RESTful APIs and service\\-oriented architectures
* Experience working with MongoDB and Microsoft SQL Server in production environments
* Solid understanding of database design, indexing, performance optimization, and data integrity
* Frontend experience with React, Next.js, Angular, HTML, CSS, and modern UI frameworks
* Familiarity with cloud platforms such as Azure (App Services, Functions, Storage, or similar)
* Experience using Git and GitHub in a collaborative team environment
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps, or similar
* Strong debugging, problem\\-solving, and communication skills
* Ability to work independently in a fully remote setup and manage your own workload



  





**What We Offer** 




 Fully remote role
 


* Direct collaboration with the founder and core product team
* Real ownership over features used by hotels every day
* Opportunity to grow into architecture, lead engineering, or product\\-focused roles
* Salary Range: 5‚Äì7 LPA

title: SDE-II || Node.js
description:
**About Us**
 Holiday Tribe is a Great Place To Work¬Æ Certified‚Ñ¢ travel\\-tech company headquartered in Gurugram. Backed by leading VC firms like Powerhouse Ventures and GSF, and having recently raised pre series A funding, we are growing rapidly and setting the stage for the next phase of scale.
   

  

 We specialize in curated leisure travel experiences across 30\\+ global destinations, combining deep human expertise with a bold vision of building cutting\\-edge AI and technology that will transform how Indians plan and experience their holidays.
   

  

 Recognized as the Emerging Holiday Tech Company at the India Travel Awards 2023, we‚Äôve also partnered with international tourism boards to bring world\\-class experiences to Indian travelers.
   

  

 At our core, we are a fun, performance\\-driven workplace on a mission to build the next big thing in travel ‚Äî making holiday planning faster, smarter, and unforgettable.
   

  

 We‚Äôre looking for a
 **Node.js Backend Developer** 
 who can help us build high\\-performance APIs and workflows that power our planning and booking assistant.
   

  

**What You‚Äôll Do**
* Build and maintain backend services using Node.js (Express) and integrate them with travel APIs (flights, hotels, activities).
* Implement RESTful APIs and services to support AI\\-powered trip planning and booking.
* Work closely with the frontend and AI orchestration layers to enable seamless end\\-user experience.
* Design clean, reusable modules to integrate with third\\-party booking platforms.
* Optimize performance and scalability of real\\-time query systems.
* Collaborate with product managers and DevOps to ensure stable deployments and quick iterations.


**What You Bring**
* 3\\+ years of backend development experience using Node.js.
* Strong understanding of JavaScript/TypeScript, RESTful APIs, and async programming.
* Experience with databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL, or MySQL).
* Familiarity with message queues (e.g. Redis, RabbitMQ, Kafka) websockets and caching mechanisms.
* Ability to write clean, modular, testable code.
* Bonus: Worked on travel, booking, or real\\-time systems.


**Perks**
* Work with a fast\\-moving team building futuristic travel tools.
* Shape backend architecture for a high\\-growth product.
* Learn and contribute to AI\\-agent orchestration pipelines.
* Competitive pay and ESOPs.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:

 Jumbo is the fastest growing shopping app in the world. Get rewarded every time you shop on our app, play free games, and win exciting prizes.
 



  





**About the Role:**

 for web and mobile applications.
* Identify, record, and thoroughly document bugs and inconsistencies.
* Collaborate with developers and product managers to ensure timely issue resolution.
* Perform

 .
* Ensure test coverage for new features and enhancements.
* Participate in requirement reviews and provide feedback on testability.

 of experience in manual testing (web and/or mobile applications).

 .

 and

title: Full-Stack Development Intern
description:
**Full\\-Stack Development Intern** 




**Company:** 
 Webs IT Solution
 



**Location:** 
 Remote
 



**Duration:** 
 3 Months
 



**Stipend:** 
 Up to ‚Çπ7,500 (Performance\\-Based)
 



**Employment Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Certificate of Internship
 



**About Webs IT Solution** 




 Webs IT Solution is committed to nurturing future\\-ready software developers through live projects, hands\\-on learning, and structured mentorship programs. The organization focuses on building strong front\\-end and back\\-end development capabilities aligned with real\\-world industry standards and modern web technologies.
 



**Role Overview** 




 As a Full\\-Stack Development Intern, you will gain end\\-to\\-end exposure to modern web application development. This role involves working across the complete development stack‚Äîfrom designing intuitive user interfaces to developing secure and scalable backend systems‚Äîmaking it ideal for candidates aspiring to become full\\-stack developers.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and deploy full\\-stack web applications using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB/MySQL
* Build and integrate RESTful APIs to ensure seamless communication between front\\-end and back\\-end systems
* Optimize applications for performance, security, and scalability
* Debug, test, and maintain codebases and repositories
* Collaborate with team members in an agile development environment
* Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement



**Eligibility \\& Requirements** 



* Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js
* Working knowledge of databases such as MongoDB and MySQL
* Familiarity with REST APIs and version control tools like Git/GitHub
* Strong logical thinking and problem\\-solving abilities
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team\\-oriented environment



**What You Will Gain** 



* Performance\\-based stipend of up to ‚Çπ7,500
* Certificate of Internship upon successful completion
* End\\-to\\-end exposure to real\\-world software development projects
* Mentorship and technical guidance from industry professionals
* Opportunity to build and strengthen a full\\-stack development portfolio
* Potential full\\-time employment opportunity based on performance

title: Full‚ÄëStack Software Engineer (Early‚ÄëStage Startup)
description:
About the Role
 
 We‚Äôre looking for a¬†
 
 dynamic, full‚Äëstack software engineer
 
 ¬†who‚Äôs excited by ambiguity, motivated by impact, and energized by building from first principles. This is an early‚Äëstage role at an ambitious startup in the recruiting space, where you‚Äôll help shape both the product and the engineering culture.
 



 You‚Äôll work across the stack¬†
 
 alongside a long‚Äëtenured software engineer from Google
 
 ¬†and collaborate closely with¬†
 
 highly motivated, creative, and experienced business leaders who have built successful companies and products
 
 . Together, you‚Äôll take real ownership over meaningful parts of the system and help turn big ideas into production‚Äëready software.
 



 If you‚Äôre hungry to learn fast, comfortable wearing many hats, and not afraid to ask questions or challenge assumptions, you‚Äôll feel right at home.
 



  




 What You‚Äôll Do
 * Own and ship end‚Äëto‚Äëend features across frontend, backend, and infrastructure.
* Build product experiences using¬†
 
 Flutter
 
 ¬†and modern web/mobile patterns.
* Design and implement backend services in¬†
 
 Python
 
 ¬†and¬†
 
 Rust
 
 , with a focus on correctness, performance, and clarity.
* Work with¬†
 
 LLMs
 
 , embeddings, and¬†
 
 vector databases
 
 ¬†to build intelligent, AI‚Äëassisted workflows.
* Integrate and deploy services using¬†
 
 Cloudflare
 
 ¬†(Workers, Pages, queues, etc.).
* Use¬†
 
 GitHub Spec‚ÄëKit
 
 ¬†and similar tools to plan, spec, and reason about systems¬†
 *before* 
 ¬†building them.
* Write clean, well‚Äëtested, maintainable code and participate actively in code reviews.
* Collaborate asynchronously with a fully remote team, communicating progress, blockers, and ideas clearly.
* Take responsibility for large pieces of the product and follow them through from concept to production.



  




 What We‚Äôre Looking For
 

 You might be a great fit if you:
 



* Have¬†
 
 2‚Äì3\\+ years of experience
 
 ¬†as a software engineer in a fast‚Äëpaced startup or similarly high‚Äëownership environment.
* Are comfortable moving across the stack and learning new technologies quickly.
* Have working knowledge of some (not necessarily all) of the following:
* Flutter
* Python
* Rust
* Cloudflare (or comparable serverless / edge platforms)
* Vector databases, embeddings, or modern AI/ML tooling
* Understand the value of planning, writing specs, and thinking through tradeoffs before writing code.
* Ask thoughtful questions, communicate clearly, and enjoy collaborating with others.
* Take ownership seriously: when something breaks or needs improvement, you see it through.
* Are creative, curious, and motivated by building something meaningful from the ground up.



  




 Nice to Have (But Not Required)
 * Experience building AI‚Äëpowered or LLM‚Äëdriven products.
* Familiarity with recruiting, HR tech, or workflow automation tools.
* Contributions to open‚Äësource projects or strong personal side projects.
* Experience designing systems for scale, reliability, or performance.



  




 Our Culture \\& How We Work
 * Remote‚Äëfirst
 
 ¬†and async‚Äëfriendly.
* Small team, high trust, high ownership.
* We value clear thinking, good writing, and honest communication.
* We plan carefully, but move fast once we commit.
* You‚Äôll have real influence on product direction and technical decisions.



  




 Why This Role Is Different
 
 This is not a narrowly scoped ticket‚Äëtaking role. You‚Äôll help define¬†
 *what* 
 ¬†we build, not just¬†
 *how* 
 . If you‚Äôre excited by early‚Äëstage energy, modern AI‚Äëdriven tooling, and the chance to grow alongside a product from the beginning, this role offers a rare level of impact and learning.

title: Senior full stack software engineer (C#/.Net/SQL Server/AWS)
description:
**Company Description** 




 We're a growing fintech serving the hospitality, wellness, and experience industries in Australia and New Zealand. Founded in 1966 as Australia‚Äôs premier hospitality publication, we're home to well\\-known brands such as bestrestaurants.com.au, bestwellness.com.au, bestgiftcards.com.au and more.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time role for a
 
 hands\\-on,
 
 senior full stack analyst/developer. It is geared towards an offshore applicant, however you'll be part of a close\\-knit team that is mostly Sydney\\-based and strong English proficiency is needed. You'll be dealing directly with business stakeholders on a range of exciting new projects, and expected to quickly understand the company's business processes and existing systems context to ensure your solutions are fit for purpose.
 



  





**Key Requirements** 



* 8\\+ years back\\-end coding experience, with minimum 5 years coding using C\\#, .Net and SQL Server.
* Experience working with AWS at a DevOps level including CodeCommit, Lambda functions, Cognito.
* Experience working on systems and dealing with business stakeholders in a fintech or ecommerce¬†business environment.
* Experience
 
 developing extensions and integrations for Umbraco CMS / Umbraco Commerce or similar eCommerce and content management platforms.
* Front\\-end development skills using Tailwind CSS, React and similar JavaScript frameworks desirable.

title: Java Software Engineer - Contracts
description:
**Job Description: Java Software Engineer (Contractual)**
**Company:** 
 Netra Labs
   

**Location:** 
 Work From Office ‚Äì Pune (Baner)
   

**Employment Type:** 
 Contractual (6‚Äì12 months, extendable)
   

**Experience:** 
 5\\+ years
   

  

**About Netra Labs**
**We're building the future of enterprise AI at Netra Labs‚Äîcrafting intelligent, scalable solutions that transform how businesses operate. Our proprietary Ground Truth¬Æ framework powers expert AI agents that deliver real ROI for clients across industries. As we scale our platform capabilities, we need sharp Java engineers who can build rock\\-solid backend services that power our AI infrastructure.**
**The Role**
**You'll be a hands\\-on Core Java Developer owning critical backend modules of our AI platform‚Äîfrom document processing pipelines (powered by AWS Textract) to real\\-time agent orchestration services. While you'll operate as an individual contributor, you'll also step up to guide junior engineers and coordinate technical execution when needed. This is a
 *work\\-from\\-office* 
 role because we believe some of the best ideas happen when smart people share a whiteboard.**
**What You'll Own**
* Design, build, and optimize high\\-performance Java services using
 **Java 17/21** 
 and
 **Spring Boot**
* **Architect and maintain data layers with MongoDB** 
 , ensuring scalability for AI workloads
* Build and manage CI/CD pipelines using
 **GitHub Actions** 
 for seamless deployments
* Deploy and manage services on
 **AWS EC2** 
 , with hands\\-on experience integrating
 **AWS Textract** 
 for document intelligence workflows
* Write clean, testable code with strong emphasis on maintainability (we're serious about reducing technical debt)
* Troubleshoot production issues and own service reliability
* Occasionally lead sprint planning or mentor junior engineers on best practices


**Who You Are**
**‚úÖ 4\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in Core Java development** 
 with deep understanding of concurrency, JVM internals, and performance tuning
   

 ‚úÖ Production experience with
 **Spring Boot** 
 (not just tutorials‚Äîwe want to see how you've used it to solve real problems)

 **MongoDB** 
 (schema design, indexing, aggregation pipelines)

 **GitHub Actions** 
 or similar CI/CD tools
   

 ‚úÖ Comfortable on
 **AWS** 
 ‚Äîspecifically EC2 deployments and
 **Textract integration** 
 for extracting text/data from documents
   

 ‚úÖ Strong grasp of REST APIs, microservices architecture, and debugging distributed systems
   

 ‚úÖ Bonus if you've worked with AI/ML pipelines or document processing systems before

title: Founding AI Engineer
description:
Company Description
 



 PrettiFlow is revolutionizing software development with an autonomous AI platform that transforms a single prompt into a complete, scalable software product. By eliminating the need for multiple tools, users can describe their desired outcome, and the system automatically designs, connects, and deploys a production\\-ready solution. Leveraging a central AI agent, PrettiFlow orchestrates specialized agents to handle all components of software creation, from frontend to backend and databases. The platform enables users to edit, expand, and scale their products effortlessly, redefining how software is built in the age of AI.
 



  





 Role Description
 



 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Founding AI Engineer. In this position, you will design, build, and optimize AI\\-driven solutions and algorithms that power our autonomous AI platform. Responsibilities include implementing state\\-of\\-the\\-art machine learning models and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to improve system architecture. You will play a vital role in driving technical innovation, addressing scalability challenges, and ensuring the platform meets high\\-performance standards.
 



  





 Qualifications
 


* Strong skills and understanding of Agent orchestration
* Expertise in Software Development and Computer Science principles
* Experience with Pattern Recognition and developing AI\\-driven solutions
* Proficiency in deploying and scaling AI agents in production environments
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and ability to work in a fast\\-paced, collaborative environment
* Experience with innovative AI or machine learning projects is a plus

title: Senior Developer
description:
Experience: 3‚Äì5 Years
 



 Location: Bangalore (Onsite)
 



 Employment Type: Full\\-time
 



 CTC: ‚Çπ12 \\-15 LPA
 



  





 About the Role
 



  





 We are looking for a Tech Delivery Lead who can take ownership of technical delivery while remaining hands\\-on. This role is ideal for strong engineers who want to step into delivery leadership early in their career, working in a fast\\-moving startup environment while building enterprise\\-grade systems.
 



  





 Fast\\-track into delivery leadership early in your career‚Äîhigh ownership, strong mentorship, and enterprise\\-grade engineering standards.
 



  





 Think speed, accountability, and real impact‚Äîwithout compromising on quality, reliability, or scale.
 



 We are a BITSian\\-founded startup, with a strong engineering culture and a bias toward execution.
 



  





 Why This Role Is Different
 



  





 Fast\\-track into delivery leadership early in your career with real ownership
 



 Startup pace, but enterprise\\-level expectations (quality, reliability, observability)
 



 Strong mentorship while leading modules or small projects
 



 Engineering\\-led culture with minimal bureaucracy
 



 Opportunity to build and ship production AI/LLM systems, not experiments
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



  





 Own end\\-to\\-end delivery of assigned projects or modules
 



 Plan, execute, and track technical delivery timelines
 



 Design, build, and maintain scalable backend and full\\-stack systems
 



 Lead technical discussions, architecture decisions, and code quality standards
 



 Collaborate closely with product, business, and engineering stakeholders
 



 Ensure reliability, performance, and on\\-time delivery
 



 Mentor engineers when required and raise the overall engineering bar
 



 Contribute to DevOps practices including CI/CD, deployments, and monitoring
 



 Build and ship AI\\-powered features such as LLM integrations and workflow automation
 



  





 Tech Stack (What You‚Äôll Work With)
 



  





 Backend: Node.js (NestJS / Express), Python (FastAPI)
 



 Frontend (as needed): React, Next.js
 



 Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
 



 AI / LLMs: LangChain, LangGraph, LLM APIs, RAG pipelines
 



 Infrastructure \\& DevOps: AWS / GCP, Docker, CI/CD pipelines, logging \\& monitoring
 



 Architecture: APIs, async systems, background workers, scalable services
 



 The exact tech mix depends on the project‚Äîengineers are encouraged to choose the right tools and evolve the stack responsibly.
 



  





 Required Skills \\& Experience
 



  





 2‚Äì5 years of hands\\-on software development experience
 



 Strong proficiency in Node.js or Python (bonus if both)
 



 Experience owning deliverables, modules, or projects independently
 



 Ability to balance hands\\-on coding with delivery responsibility
 



 Working knowledge of cloud platforms and DevOps fundamentals
 



 Strong communication skills and an ownership\\-driven mindset
 



  





 Good to Have
 



  





 Prior experience mentoring engineers or leading small teams
 



 Exposure to AI/ML or LLM\\-based systems
 



 Hands\\-on or learning experience with LangChain, LangGraph, or similar tools
 



 Experience working in startups or fast\\-paced product environments
 



  





 Startup Culture at ThinkByte
 



  





 Flat hierarchy, high trust, and clear ownership
 



 Move fast, but build for scale and reliability
 



 Strong focus on learning, accountability, and execution
 



 Founded and led by BITS alumni, with a culture of meritocracy

title: ServiceNow Developer - GRC
description:
Job Summary
 



 We are seeking an experienced ServiceNow Developer with strong expertise in GRC/IRM modules to design, develop, and implement advanced customizations on the ServiceNow platform. The ideal candidate will have hands\\-on experience in server\\-side scripting, workflow development, and integrations, along with a solid understanding of Agile/SAFe delivery practices.
 



 Key Responsibilities
 


* Design, develop, and implement ServiceNow customizations including core platform setup, workflow administration, reporting, data imports, and third\\-party integrations.
* Perform advanced platform customizations using Business Rules, Script Includes, ACLs, UI Pages, UI Macros, UI Scripts, Client Scripts, workflows, custom tables, and reports.
* Develop and configure workflows and automation for ServiceNow platform applications.
* Program enhancements, workflows, and integrations across ServiceNow modules.
* Ensure best practices in server\\-side scripting and platform development.
* Support data loads, platform configurations, and continuous improvement initiatives.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams in an Agile/SAFe delivery environment.
* Participate in design discussions, code reviews, and solution architecture planning.



 Required Skills \\& Qualifications
 


* 3\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in ServiceNow GRC/IRM modules.
* Strong expertise in Business Rules, Script Includes, ACLs, and server\\-side scripting.
* Experience in workflow design, configuration, and development on ServiceNow.
* Proven experience with platform customization and integrations.
* Good understanding of Agile and/or SAFe methodologies.
* Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills.
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.



 Preferred Qualifications
 


* ServiceNow certifications (CSA / CAD / GRC\\-related certifications).
* Experience working in enterprise\\-scale ServiceNow implementations.
